rules_text:
Whenever you spend three or more colors of mana to activate an ability of Fathoms Spearhunter, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
{2}{RW}: Fathoms Spearhunter gains double strike until end of turn.
{3}{UB}: Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one into your hand and the other into your graveyard.
